summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of the checkify transformation, ensuring it correctly detects numerical errors (NaNs, out‑of‑bounds) and respects custom derivative rules across JAX primitives and parallel/distributed execution modes.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of the checkify feature in the JAX ecosystem, providing confidence that error checking works consistently in JIT‑compiled, mapped, and sharded computations.
